name: Never rob my Udon, Kumakku!
description:
2015, the final episode of Fute&Kuma.
The last battle that FutePen challenges Kumakku.
Jump, jump and get Udon!!!
Controll easily, play exciting on-line game!!!

If you want the Udon, fight against me, Kumakku!!!
Eeek～～～, Mr.FutePen is scary～～～...

There is Udon above.
The winner is one jumping who reaches the Udon～～.

In the solo play, try to clear stages by yourself.
In the multi play, the two face～～.

Touch and drag to set the direction to jump and detouch to jump～～.
Try to land on boards skillfully and aim to jump higher.

The game mode comes in completion of Solo, Local match-up, World match-up.
You can play anywhere with anyone～～～.
You can send and receive messages in the game～～～.

The final episode of the Fute&Kuma Udon wars trilogy!

2015, at the end of this year, to cap the year, let me say this!!! Never r
